title: Likely oxides of Rb given table of group 1 oxides

content.question: Based on the information above and periodic trends, which of the following is the best hypothesis regarding the oxide(s) formed by Rb?

choices.label: Rb will form only Rb2O and Rb2O2.
Rb will form Rb2O, Rb2O2, and RbO2.

content.answer: Rb will form Rb2O, Rb2O2, and RbO2.

skill.text: 2.B: Formulate a hypothesis or predict the results of an experiment.
